thread.title: Pacific Rim 2: First Look At Scott Eastwood In Jaeger Armor
thread.title_full: Pacific Rim 2: First Look At Scott Eastwood In Jaeger Armor

author: Jamie Lovett
title: Pacific Rim 2: First Look At Scott Eastwood In Jaeger Armor
text:
Pacific Rim 2: First Look At Scott Eastwood In Jaeger Armor Jamie Lovett Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Scott Eastwood is gearing up to battle some Kaiju. A new photo from the set of Pacific Rim: Uprising in Sydney, Australia offers fans their first look at Eastwood in his Jaeger pilot armor. 
This first look at Eastwood, who played GQ Edwards in Suicide Squad , in Jaeger pilot armor follows a first look at co-star John Boyega ( Star Wars: The Force Awakens)in his own Jaeger pilot armor. 
A photo posted by 《ѕсотт Eαѕтωооd》 (@scotteastwoodfanpage) on Feb 5, 2017 at 5:01am PST 
Eastwood is reportedly playing a Jaeger pilot named Nate Lamber, who joins Jake Pentecost (Boyega), the son of Stacker Pentecost (Idris Elba in the first Pacific Rim ), to battle a new wave of Kaiju monsters. 
More Pacific Rim: Scott Eastwood Shares Behind-The-Scenes Photo / John Boyega Hits The Gym / Boyega Shares Pacific Rim: Uprising Art / New Look At Boyega In Jaeger Armor / Is Karl Urban In Pacific Rim: Uprising? / First Look At Boyega In Jaeger Armor / 
Pacific Rim: Uprising is directed by Steven S. DeKnight ( Marvel’s Daredevil ) and written by DeKnight, Emily Carmichael, Kira Snyder, and T.S. Nowlin from a story by Guillermo del Toro. 
Pacific Rim: Uprising stars John Boyega, Scott Eastwood, Cailee Spaeny and Jing Tian, as well as Rinko Kikuchi, Charlie Day, and Burn Gorman, who will reprise their roles from the first Pacific Rim . 
Pacific Rim: Uprising opens Feb. 23, 2018. Pacific Rim: Uprising 2018 ComicBook Anticipated #30 Best-Rated Before Release Anticipated Rating
